presentations.line1: I am versatile to meet your expectations.
presentations.line2: Build your future project with me now.

about.title: About
about.description:
I use Farmeurimmo as my pseudonym on the internet. I am a Full Stack developer and a French system administrator. I am a bit of a polyglot, I do not limit myself to a single technology or programming language.


I am passionate about computing (hardware, software, network) and new technologies in general. I own several cloud machines (vps/dedicated) for my personal and professional projects.


I also practice climbing (mostly indoor) and calisthenics.

0.title: New website with portfolio in his 4 version (Svelte, i18n, Vite, Tailwindcss)
0.description: In this article I will talk about the motivations behind my new website in his 4 version, the tech choices (Svelte, i18n, Vite, Tailwindcss) I made and the features I added (contact form, blog, multi language, etc..).
